restaurants.name: The Office
restaurants.review: Felt like a budget boardroom meeting with food. Not the worst, but definitely not the move.

restaurants.name: Senbon Sakura Cafe & Japanese Kitchen
restaurants.review: Straight-up Tokyo vibes. Cozy, comforting, and dripping in umami goodness.

restaurants.name: Poco Sicilian Street Food
restaurants.review: A quick Sicilian getaway… but like, economy class. Solid, but not a life-changer.

restaurants.name: Tesco Express
restaurants.review: For when desperation hits. Zero vibes, 100% survival mode.

restaurants.name: Olive and Thai
restaurants.review: An absolute flavor riot. Spicy, saucy, and straight-up Thailand in a bite.

restaurants.name: White Cloth Hall
restaurants.review: Big flavors, big vibes. Like a food market but make it fancy.

restaurants.name: Honi Poke
restaurants.review: Tasted like a beach vacay, but my stomach didn’t get the memo. Bougie but risky.

restaurants.name: Things in Bread
restaurants.review: Bread? Elite. Coffee? Elite. The vibes? Off the charts. Carbs and caffeine = a religion.

restaurants.name: Sesame Salad Bar
restaurants.review: Mysterious energy. Could be next-level greens, could be disappointment in a bowl.
